name: chain mail
description: A suit of interlocking metal rings, offering balanced protection.

name: scale mail
description: Overlapping metal scales, providing robust defense.

name: studded leather
description: Leather armor reinforced with metal studs.

name: padded armor
description: Thick, padded cloth, suitable for stealth.

name: splint armor
description: Metal strips on a fabric backing, a balance between mobility and protection.

name: ring mail
description: Armor made of small metal rings sewn onto a leather backing.

name: brigandine
description: A garment lined with small steel plates, concealed for subtlety.
